title: tfw Riot would rather open server and help Japanese players...
body:
...than their own poor and serverless countrymen in NA east cost smh tbh

tfw called a noob cause east coast ping happens to be high and talked down with unsupported hypotheticals like "hurr durr well if you wanted a better ping move to the west coast you'd be ok with it" which i guess makes central US noobish too despite being kinda high ping smh tbh damn Riot.

:^)
